topics.body:
I found my pants again.
It was under the couch.

In other news, I was playing Warframe in an Invasion Mission with the Corpus as allies. While heading to extraction, I found this corridor with these rooms. In the rooms were bunks so I figured it must've been the Grineer's bedrooms and stuff.
While searching the rooms, I found a Grineer lootable body on one of those beds.

It was depressing, to say at least.

topics.body:
Oh snap; someone actually made a extremely efficient neurochip.  Every chip can simulate 65k brain cells and is 100k times more efficient.  Blah blah blah this can greatly improve simulating the human brain with computers.
http://www.stanford.edu/group/brainsinsilicon/challenge.html
Personally I think, not a expert in the field, when we get human level intelligence Ai they're probably going to rely on neurochips instead of a traditional supercomputers cause when you think about it traditional computers weren't build to mirror how the human brain works and therefore having something like skynet or such would be insanely inefficient.  A traditional computer like we've been using would require a much larger computer and far more powerful computer to run the Ai that there's not really a comparison.  Why have a computer the size of a room that's insanely inefficient when you can have a computer the size of desktop or something?

Tl:dr; For the people that want android boyfriends/girlfriends you may just get your wish.



Also I realized something awesome about being bi/gay; whenever someone asks if you're attracted to them you can respond, "Sorry I only like hot guys/hot women".
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53765a4c636872107f4e0200#post_53765a4c636872107f4e0200
You know what? As someone coming from a conservative community that says there is only one "right" way to go when it comes to orientation, I for one salute you. If you are gay, so be it! You are not interfering with anyone else's life and are just being happy with someone who you love. I can find no fault in that at all. I wish you both the best.
